channel.title: It's random shirt day!
channel.description:
Just thought I'd share the deal for those who didn't know. shirt.woot.com sells a different shirt each day for $10, and today is random shirt day where (just for today) you pay $6.66 (free shipping) and they send you a random shirt from their warehouse. It's awesome, I've loved every shirt I've gotten and they've all been made of a good, comfortable material.
www.shirt.woot.com
=)

If you look at some of the examples, they’re usually somewhat clever designs.
